64382.「……そなたの ご主人は ワシが責任を持って\n 探すゆえ 安心してくだされ。\:
I will be responsible for finding your
husband, so you can rest easy. I owe quite a
lot to that Monster Master.

64384.「おお <pc>！\n おぬしのことを 待っておったんじゃ。: Oh, <pc>! I've been waiting for you.

64385.「マレイカどの。この <pc>は\n これまで 何度も ワシを救ってくれた\n:
Maleika, this is <pc>. <if_woman>she<else>he<endif> is
quite the capable adventurer, even saving
my life many times already!

64386.<if_woman>「彼女に かかれば またたく間に\n この問題も 解決するじ:
If <if_woman>she's<else>he's<endif> willing to help, then we'll have
this problem solved in no time at all!

64388.「紹介しよう。こちらのマレイカどのは\n 戦争で行方不明になった ご主人を探しに:
<pc>, this is Maleika. She's
returned here to Al-Ahagiro in search of her
husband, who was lost in the war.

64389.「そして その ご主人というのが\n カレヴァンという まもの使いの青年なんじゃ:
Her husband is a young man who also happens to
be a Monster Master.

64390.「<pc>。\n おぬしには そのカレヴァンを\n 見つけてきてほしいと 思って:
I have my faith that you will find him for
me.

64391.「どうか お願いします <pc>さま！\n この子を 安心させてあげたくて……。:
Please, <pc>, I'm begging you!
I just want my child to know he's safe...

64392.「ママー……。パパに あえるのー？: Mommy... when can I see daddy?

64393.「……大丈夫よ ラッセ。\n きっと もうすぐ 会えるわ。:
Don't worry, Lasse. You will see him soon,
I just know it.

64394.「なんの手がかりもない 依頼じゃが\n おぬしを見込んで 頼みたいんじゃ。\n:
I don't have any leads, but... I'd like to
ask for your help anyways. Well? Will you?

64395.「おお そうか！ 受けてくれるか。: Oh, great! I knew I could count on you.

64397.「戦争の時 まもの使いたちには\n だいぶ 助けられたからの……。\n ワシから:
The Monster Masters helped out immensely
during the war... so that's why I'm asking
you to help them.

64398.「……<pc>。これは 奥方には\n ヒミツじゃが おそらく カレヴァンも\n:
<pc>... I didn't want his wife
to hear, but... perhaps Kalevan also
transformed in a monster.

64399.「カレヴァンは 左目に十字キズがある青年でな\n きっと 魔物になっても 左目に:
Kalevan is a young man with a cross-shaped
scar over his left eye. If he became a
monster, the scar should still be there.

64400.「もし 左目に十字キズのある魔物を 見つけたら\n 秘かに ワシの所へ 連れてく:
If you find a monster with a scar like that,
bring it here discreetly... I think going to
the Kudus Spring will change him back.

64402.「おお。ありがたや……と 言いたいところじゃが\n おぬし 他の者からの頼まれご:
Ah, thank you, but... it seems you already
have your hands quite full with other requests
right now.

64403.「奥方のためにも それらの依頼は\n 速やかに片付け 急いで戻ってまいるのじゃ。:
Please complete those requests as soon as you
can, for the sake of his wife. I will wait for
you here.

64404.「ぬっ！？ そうか おぬしも\n 忙しいんじゃな……。: Huh?! I see... You must be quite busy...

64405.「しかし 奥方と幼子が 困っておるのを\n このまま 放っておくわけにもいかんし:
However, I can't just leave his wife and child
worrying like this. Please come back if you
change your mind.

64407.「おぬしには こちらのマレイカどのの ご主人\n カレヴァンという名の まもの使:
I'd like you to find Maleika's husband,
Kalevan. He is a young man who also happens to
be a Monster Master.

64408.「お願いします <pc>さま。\n この子を 安心させてあげたくて……。:
Please, <pc>! I don't want my
child to worry...

64409.「なんの手がかりもない むずかしい依頼じゃが\n おぬしを見込んで 頼みたいんじ:
I don't have any leads, but... I'd like to
ask for your help anyways. Well? Will you?

64411.「わーっ ビックリした！\n ひさしぶりに会えて うれしいよ！\n でも どうし:
This is a surprise! I'm so happy to see you
again after such a long time!
But... why are you here?!

64412.「……ええっ！？ カレヴァンさんの奥さんが\n カレヴァンさんを 探しに\n ア:
Huh?! Kalevan's wife came all the way to
Al-Ahagiro looking for him?

64413.「でも それって 私たちがいる\n この世界の アラハギーロじゃなくて\n 私た:
But... she's not in the Al-Ahagiro of this
world... she's in the other one. The one
we're from.

64414.「……ってことは <pc>さんは\n 元の世界に戻る方法を 見つけたのね！\n:
...which means that you found a way to get
back to the real world! Can you tell us how
you did it?!

64415.<pc>は 真のレンダーシアに戻る方法と\nそこで見てきたことを セラフィに説明:
<pc> explained to Seraphi how to
return to the true Lendersia and what they
had seen there.

64416.「へえー！ その…ぶれいぶすとーん？\n っていうのを使えば 元の世界に戻れるん:
What?! So... if you use that "breib stown",
you can get back to the real world?

64417.「しかも そっちの世界には\n 魔物に変えられた 呪いを解く\n クドゥスの泉な:
And in your world, there's a Kudus Spring that
breaks the curse that turns people into
monsters...

64418.「じゃあ <pc>さんと 一緒に戻って\n カレヴァンさんが その泉に つかれば:
So if you and Kalevan go to that spring,
he'll be able to change back into a human...

64419.「……ねぇ カレヴァンさん。\n 家族に 会いたいよね？\n 一緒に 元いた世界:
Hey, Kalevan... you miss your family, right?
Let's go back home, together!

64422.「<pc>さん！\n その ぶれいぶすとーんっていうのを 使って\n 私たちを:
<pc>! Use that "breib stown" thing
so we can go back to the other Al-Ahagiro!

64423.「よく わからなくて ちょっぴり不安だけど\n とりあえず アラハギーロ王国の前:
I'm not really sure how any of this stuff
works, and I'm kinda nervous, but... I'll be
waiting at the pillar outside Al-Ahagiro!

64425.「私たち ようやく\n 元の世界に 戻れるんだね……。: We can finally return to our world...

64426.「じゃあ さっそくだけど\n <pc>さんに くっついてくから\n いつものよう:
Well then, I'll let you do your thing, and
we'll be right behind you!

64429.「<pc>さん！ \n 急に目の前から 消えたと思ったら\n また すぐ現れるか:
<pc>! I was surprised to see you
disappear in a flash... but now you're back
again!

64430.「……どうやら 私たちが\n <pc>さんにくっついて この石塔から\n 元の世:
I guess we can't follow behind you and go
back to the real world after all...

64431.「うーん……。\n カレヴァンさんを 家族のもとに\n 帰してあげたかったのにな:
Hmmm... I wish I could've sent Kalevan
home to see his family...

64432.「せめて 奥さんに カレヴァンさんは\n 元気だよって 伝えたいね。:
If I could just somehow tell his wife that
he's doing okay...

64433.「カレヴァンさんが 人間だった時\n 着けてた カメオ……\n あれが 今もあっ:
That cameo that Kalevan had when he was a
human... I wish we still had it...

64435.「え！？ カレヴァンさん\n あのカメオが どこにいっちゃったか\n 知ってるの:
Huh?! Are you saying you know where the cameo
went?

64438.「あのね。カレヴァンさんのカメオ\n こっちに来て すぐ ナシームの洞くつにいる:
Umm... Kalevan said that his cameo was stolen
by a monster in Naseem Cave right after he
first got here!

64439.「その魔物が まだ 持ってるかもしれないよね。\n 今すぐ そのカメオ 取り返し:
They could still have it. Let's go to the cave
and see if we can get it back!

64440.「<pc>さん。ナシームの洞くつは\n アラハギーロ地方の東のほうの\n 地下に:
Naseem Cave is underground in
the eastern part of the Al-Ahagiro Region.
Will you come with me?

64441.「その魔物は 洞くつの中の\n 悪鬼のねぐらって所に いるみたいなの……。\n:
I think the monster is in a place called
Devil's Roost inside the cave... that's where
we should head first.

64443.「今日は どのアクセ 着けよっかな～♪\n ピンクパールで かわいいアタシを演出:
Which accessory should I wear today, hmmm?
The pink pearls are soooo cute, but the rosary
would make me look fabulous!

64444.「カレヴァンさん……。\n あのコが カメオを盗ってったの？:
Kalevan... she's the one who stole your
cameo?

64447.「キャーーー！！ ひとの おめかし中に\n 無断で 入ってくるなんて……\n 変:
Get out!!! Don't you know you're not supposed
to come into a girl's room while she's getting
all pretty?! You bunch of creepers!!

64448.「え！？ いや ちがうの。あのね……\n 私たち あなたが持ってるカレヴァンさん:
Huh?! N-no, that's not it... um...
All we want is for you to return Kalevan's
cameo...

64449.「イヤーー！！ 早く 出てってよッ！！\n この部屋は アタシだけの\n 秘密の:
NO! WAY! I told you to get out!! This place
is MY secret dressing room and I want you
all to leave! NOW!

64450.「ううっ <cs_pchero>さん……。\n 悪いんだけど あの子を\n ちょ:
Ummm, <cs_pchero>...
Sorry to ask, but do you think you can deal
with her?

64452.「言ってるでしょおおおおおおおお！！: DON'T MAKE ME SAY IT AGAIN!!

64453.「キャーー！！ また 誰か入ってきたッ！\n ヘンタイーーー！！\n アンタたち:
Ahhhh! What do you want now, you creepers?!
I told you all to get lost!!

64454.「よかった <cs_pchero>さん。来てくれたのね！\n あのコ 私の話 聞:
Thank goodness, you came back! She won't
listen to me, so... can you please take care
of it?

64456.「言ってるでしょおおおおおおおお！！: DON'T MAKE ME SAY IT AGAIN!!

64457.「ひどいわッ！ おめかし してるときに\n 勝手に入ってきて 乱暴するなんて……:
What's your problem?! You come barging in
here while I'm getting all pretty... I've
never felt so violated!

64458.「ごっ ごめんね……。私たち……\n あなたが持ってる カメオを\n 返してほし:
S-sorry... um... we...
We just want back that cameo you have.

64461.「そう それっ！！\n それね…… この子のなの！\n ……あの よかったら 返:
Yeah, that's it! It belongs to him...
If it's not any trouble, could he please
have it back?

64462.「気に入ってたけど…… いいわ。\n どうせ 今日のコーディネートには\n 合わ:
I did kind of like it, but... sure. It
wouldn't have matched with my outfit today
anyways. Hmph!

64463.「キャッ！ もう こんな時間！？\n デートに遅れちゃうじゃないのよー！:
Ah, it's that time already?! I can't be late
for my date!

64464.「……なんだったんだろうね あの子。\n でも カメオ返してもらえてよかったわ！:
Wonder what that was all about...
But I'm so happy we got the cameo back!

64465.「これが カレヴァンさんが着けてた\n 大事なカメオよ。<cs_pchero>さ:
Can you do me a huge favor, and deliver this
to Kalevan's wife for me?

64469.「<cs_pchero>さん。このカメオを渡すときに\n 今すぐには帰れないが:
Kalevan also wants you to deliver a message to
his wife. He wants her to know that he can't
come back just yet, but that he will soon.

64471.<cs_pchero>は セラフィから\n銀のカメオ（だいじなもの）を 受け取っ:
<cs_pchero> received
the Silver Cameo (Key Item) from Seraphi.<me 60>

64472.「でも 早いうちに こっちの世界から\n 元の世界に戻れる方法を 探さなきゃ……:
But... we really gotta find a way to get back
to our world as soon as possible...

64473.「私たちも 心当たりを調べてみる。\n 元の世界に戻れる方法が わかったら\n:
We'll see what we can find. Once we can figure
it out, let's meet up again!

72314.「おおっ <pc>！\n ちょうどよいところに 戻ってきてくれたのう。\n マレ:
Oh, <pc>! Just in time.
Maleika was beginning to worry.

72316.「ぬっ カレヴァンと会えたのか！: Oh! You found Kalevan, didn't you?!

72318.「でも…… でしたら なぜ\n 帰ってこないのでしょう？\n 夫は どこにいて:
But... if he's alive, then... why hasn't he
come home? Where is he? What is he doing?!

72320.「ふぬ……。おぬしを 疑うわけではないが\n 何か カレヴァンの無事を示す\n:
Hmm... I don't doubt you, but there must be
some evidence that Kalevan is okay...

72321.<pc>は マレイカに\n銀のカメオを 渡して\nカレヴァンからの メッセージを:
<pc> gave Maleika the Silver Cameo,
as well as a message from Kalevan!

72322.「これは…… 私が あの人の無事を祈って\n 出征の前に渡した カメオに\n ま:
This is... this is the cameo I gave him as
a good luck charm for the war, isn't it?

72323.「ふむ……。カレヴァンは 今すぐには帰れないが\n いずれ 必ず帰るから 心配す:
Hmm... so Kalevan said that he can't come
home just yet, but he will be soon, and we
shouldn't worry...

72324.「帰れないのに くわしく 語らないということは\n 何か 私たちを心配させまいと:
The fact that he can't return home yet and
won't say why probably means there is a
reason he doesn't want us to worry...

72325.「私は 夫の言葉を信じて\n このまま 待つことにいたします。\n この子にも:
I'll believe his words and keep waiting for
him. I'll tell Lasse he's doing just fine.

72326.「ムーニス王さま <pc>さま。\n いろいろと ありがとうございました。\n:
<if_woman>Ms.<else>Mr.<endif> <pc>, King Moonis... thank you
for everything. This gives me hope for the
best...

72327.「うむ！\n また 何かあったら いつでも来るがいい。:
Of course! If there's anything else you need,
you can always come to me.

72328.「さて <pc>。\n おぬしが 何を見てきたのか\n くわしく 話してくれんか:
Now, <pc>. Please tell me what
you saw.

72329.「おぬし 魔物になったカレヴァンを\n 見つけたのじゃろう？ どうして\n ここ:
You found Kalevan as a monster, didn't you?
Why didn't you bring him here?

72330.<pc>は 偽りのレンダーシアの存在と\nそこで カレヴァンと再会してからのでき:
<pc> told King Moonis about the false
Lendersia and what had happened since he
last saw Kalevan.

72331.「なんてことじゃ。カレヴァンや 兵士たちは\n 偽りのレンダーシアなる場所に\n:
How horrible... it seems Kalevan and the other
soldiers were taken to this false Lendersia...

72332.「到底 信じられんが……\n おぬしが そう言うからには\n 信じるしかあるまい:
It's quite hard to believe, but...
If you say so, I know it must be the truth.

72333.「そうじゃ！ おぬしへの礼が まだじゃったな。\n むずかしい頼みを聞いてくれて:
That's right! I haven't had a chance to thank
you for such a difficult task. Please accept
this as my thanks!

72334.「そういえば おぬし……。\n カレヴァンのカメオを ナシームの洞くつで\n 見:
Speaking of which... you said that you found
Kalevan's cameo in Naseem Cave...

72335.「カレヴァンは 連れ去られた後で\n カメオを盗られたと……。\n ふむ…… ナ:
And after he was taken, his cameo was
stolen... Hmmm.... Naseem Cave...

80233.しかし セラフィも チョメも\nこちらには 来ていないようだ。:
But there was no sign of Seraphi nor Clawde
anywhere...

80234.<pc>は ふたたび\nブレイブストーンを 使った！: <pc> used the Brave Stone once more!
